Gerindra Kembali Kritik Wiliam PSI Karena Ungkap Anggaran Janggal
06 Nov 2019, 10:42 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Fraksi Partai Gerindra DPRD DKI kembali mengomentari aksi kader PSI William Aditya Sarana yang membuka anggaran janggal dalam rancangan APBD DKI 2020. Wakil Ketua Fraksi Gerindra Andyka menyinggung William yang membuka anggaran pembelian lem senilai Rp 82 miliar ke sosial media namun tidak ikut dalam rapat pembahasan pengadaan lem tersebut.
"Kalau enggak ikut rapat terus bicaranya di luar, apa itu pantas?," ujar Andyka saat ditemui di DPRD, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Hal tersebut disampaikan Andyka karena William berada di Komisi A, sedangkan pembahasan pengadaan lem oleh Suku Dinas Pendidikan Jakarta Barat di bahas di Komisi E.
"Ini yang diteriakin kerjaan Komisi E sementara dia Komisi A," tambahnya.
Selain itu lanjut Andyka jika ada temuan yang janggal dalam rancangan anggaran seharusnya disampaikan salam forum resmi agar tidak menuai pro kontra.
Andyka menuding jika tindakan Wiliam tesebut akan menghambat proses pembahasan APBD.
"Kalau seolah olah kami lihat ini menghambat pembahasan APBD. Padahal kami sudah menggunakan pola transparansi,"ujarnya.
Sebelumnya William juga ditegur oleh Wakil Ketua Komisi A Inggard Joshua yang berasal dari Fraksi Gerindra. Inggrad menyatakan William seharusnya tak berkoar-koar kepada masyarakat sebelum anggaran tersebut dibahas oleh DPRD DKI bersama pemerintah.
"Sebagai anggota dewan kita perlu punya rasa harga diri dan punya tata krama dalam rangka menyampaikan aspirasi," Inggard.
William sebelumnya membuka anggaran janggal APBD DKI Jakarta 2020 melalui cuitannya di media sosial twitter. Dia menemukan adanya anggaran pengadaan lem aibon sebesar Rp 82 miliar, ballpoint sebesar Rp 124 miliar dan sejumlah anggaran lainnya.
Kini, legislator termuda di DPRD DKI Jakarta tersebut pun diadukan ke Badan Kehormatan. Seorang bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan William karena dianggap melanggar kode etik.
text:
Gerindra Critics Against PSI Because of Unclear Budget Disclosures
Nov 6, 2019, 10:42 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The DKI Jakarta DPRD Gerindra Party faction again commented on the action of PSI cadre William Aditya Sarana who opened an odd budget in the 2020 DKI APBD draft. participated in the meeting to discuss the procurement of glue.
"If you don't take part in the meeting and then talk outside, is that appropriate?" Andyka said when met at the DPRD, Central Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
This was conveyed by Andyka because William was in Commission A, while the discussion on the procurement of glue by the West Jakarta Education Agency was discussed at Commission E.
"This is what the Commission E works as a commission while he is Commission A," he added.
In addition, Andyka continued, if there were unusual findings in the draft budget, it should be conveyed in an official forum so as not to reap the pros and cons.
Andyka accused that Wiliam's action would hamper the budget discussion process.
"If it seems as if we see this is hampering the discussion of the APBD. Even though we have used a pattern of transparency," he said.
Previously William was also reprimanded by Deputy Chairman of Commission A Inggard Joshua from the Gerindra Faction. Inggrad said that William should not have talked to the public before the budget was discussed by the DKI DPRD along with the government.
"As members of the board we need to have a sense of self-worth and have manners in order to convey aspirations," Inggard.
William previously opened the odd budget of the DKI Jakarta 2020 APBD through his tweet on social media Twitter. He found a budget for procurement of aibon glue of Rp. 82 billion, a ballpoint of Rp. 124 billion and a number of other budgets.
Now, the youngest legislator in DKI Jakarta DPRD is also complained to the Honorary Board. A person named Sugiyanto reported William because he was considered to violate the code of ethics.
